Room.Name: Trees Above Etolos
Room.ShortDescription: You are high above the ground, in the trees overlooking Etolos.
Room.LongDescription: This is a rather common place for the higher level druids to meditate and take in all that nature has to offer. The druids take care of nature and in turn, nature takes care of them. The trees around the inner circle of Etolos are very tall and strong, being able to support many people on their limbs.
